body.name: IYOFINE Eye to Cam 3 Webcam 4K with Suction Cup Fixed in The Middle Screen, 8MP IMX179 CMOS, Zoom Lens Auto Focus Camera, Create a Positive Connection in Every Calls/Conferencing.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 13. Order within 13 hrs 1 min
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 13. Order within 22 hrs 1 min
features: 【Eye to Cam webcam】Face to face conversation. Build positive connections in every call/meeting.

【Small but Fine】The E2E is only 0.6 inches wide and the cable is only 0.1 inches wide and 2 meters long. And with a small and transparent suction cup, it will not block your sight. Can be installed anywhere on the screen.
【CMOS for SONY IMX179 8MP】 Support up to 4K/15fps (3264×2448) resolution, autofocus lens.Automatically recognize your face and focus more precisely.

【Built-in Noise-Cancelling Microphone】The built-in noise-cancelling tech reduces surrounding noise to improve the sound quality of your video. Pick up your voice even at 10ft distance. Whether you're inside or outside, it can always create superior sound effects for hassle-free communication.

【Plug and Play】Easy to Setup, just Play and Plug, No additional driver need. It also comes with a universal clip, with a 6.4ft USB power cable that fits to laptops desktops, mac, pc and LCD monitors. The fixed focal length lens captures high def video at an ultra wide-angle of up to 110 degrees that is great for all kinds of presentations.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: EYE TO EYE CAM 3 - A new way to communicate through video EYE TO EYE CAM 3 is a mid-screen webcam that can attract your audience and maximize your charm.

EYE TO CAMERA Eye to EYE CAM 3 is essential for building personal and professional relationships, yet laptops and webcams don’t allow it. They operate at angles that break natural eye contact, which reduces feelings of trust and connection. This webcam solves this problem by allowing you to talk face to face, as you would do in person.

Flexible installation EYE TO EYE CAM 3 suction cup is made of highly transparent PVC material. The adsorption is stable, does not damage the display, and the light transmittance is as high as 95%. Can be installed anywhere on the display screen.

Stored on the back of the monitor Two cable hook is also included for easy storage. By putting it on the back of your display or on the side of your PC. The camera will be readily available whenever you need it. Suction cup humidification-stable installation Some monitor screens have an anti-glare coating. If it falls off, please humidify the surface of the suction cup. Installation is more secure. Cable from the top of the screen It's essential to be able to move the camera to get good eye-contact. Our product is easy to adjust, you can just move and change the angle of the camera any time you like.

Built-in omnidirectional microphone The built-in omnidirectional microphone offers total transparency in any recording situation. It picks up incredible detail and depth of sound. 78° viewing angle The most natural viewing angle, improving security and privacy. 0.1 inch ultra thin cable At only 0.6 inches small, it's not in the way, and the 0.1 inch cord is hardly visible when looking at your display. The suction pad is transparent and so blends in as well.
Included Items USB-A to C Adapter*1 Waterproof Carrying Case*1 Cable Hook*2 Suction Pad*2 2-stage Tripod*1 EYE TO EYE CAM 3 Webcam*1

1080P MF 4K AF Price $88 $109 Max. Resolution 1080P/30fps 4K/15fps,1080P/30fps CMOS OV2719 (1/2.7") IMX179(1/3.2") Pixel 2.1MP 8MP Focus Type Manual focus Auto focus Field of View 78° 78° Compatibility Suitable for daily video conferencing/calls, meet/zoom/webex and other conferencing software Suitable for professional video recording, live broadcast and other scenarios.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Device! Really helps with eye contact
reviews.reviewText: This is a great device, it really helps create natural eye contact. Here are my tips: 1) make sure you push the suction down firmly. The first time I used it it popped off and then your camera goes all whacky and who knows what they can see. After pushing firmly have not had any issues have been on calls for 3+ hours. 2) it really is not distracting it is so small that you just get used to it. Fantastic if you want to read a document and look natural. 3) Make sure to play with your camera settings on your computer. At first i thought the camera quality was poor, all I had to do was go play with my camera settings. It is not quite as nice as the camera on my Brio but I am using it more frequently due to the above great features.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Horrible Video Quality
reviews.reviewText: This webcam is a great idea…with laughably bad execution. I’ve tried with both Zoom and Teams. Definitely allows for better eye contact. However, you have to be comfortable being on a conference call looking like a cartoon. The image and video quality is horrendous, just totally awful. Stick with a real webcam from a reputable company, and just live with the required camera angle. The product is a joke, only it’s not funny because of how expensive is is for what you get. Run away!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great camera, high recommend, but still some gripes
reviews.reviewText: Bottom line—I’m keeping this camera, and recommend this camera to others.It’s miles better than the laptop camera found even in high-end laptops. Macbook Pro, I’m speaking to you. This is 4k and wide angle. Before complaining about wide angle and no zoom capability, know that this framing means you look more at ease rather than staring at your eyes close up or up your nose. For business purposes, this is the difference between poor video that you think your sales prospects have gotten used to vs. looking crisp, clear and fun to chat with.I bought some lighting equipment for the room, a Smith-Victor LED 13” disk with a tripod. (Pricey but worth it - no glare, no bright light eye strain). Now, I don’t look like I’m in a cave or tent but instead my own Zoom room. It looks pro.That out of the way, let me express some gripes, which are not deal-breakers but which the company should fix with more accessories. As some other commenters have said, the suction cups don’t always stay on the screen. It’s already happened to me once. I cleaned the screen and the suction cup with screen cleaning fluid and a microfiber cloth. I also positioned the camera and pushed in on the suction cup firmly, and the camera didn’t dislodge, and the call lasted an hour. So, problem solved? Sort of, but I wish for an accessory that allows the camera to hang from the top of the laptop’s monitor. Or even a desktop arm that allows for fluid positioning.But as I repeat, this is a great product and worth getting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This such a great web camera, it is so tiny, I can stick it to the screen of my 32" curved lcd monitor and not even notice it there. This thing might make a blogger out of me yet. It is nice that it is portable too. You could put this almost anywhere to use as a spy or nanny cam due to it's size and long cord just need to plug into a USB outlet for power. Ireally like it is in 4k as well so you have a great picture as well. I'm not sure how low of a light source you can use yet but will guess pretty low due to the resolution and frame rate, I will have to try that out in the near future.Overall this is a really useful product for anyone in need of a great ultra tiny camera for whatever reason, be it blogging, spying, or just watching your pets while you are out, I highly recommend this camera, simple to set up as well. If you really want to have some fun stick it to your forehead when you play with your little ones, you'll have a blast watching them crack up at their silly parent with a camera stuck to their head and you'll get some priceless footage you can keep forever.You know you want one so just go for it, you'll be happy that you did. Yes, I do give this one kudos for all around fun and versatility.Reviewed by,Michael Jamed Fox,Beavercreek, Ohio

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not a Quality Camera
reviews.reviewText: (first image displayed is the Eye to Eye and the second is my own integrated webcam).I was excited to try out this camera. As someone who does a significant amount of interfacing using a webcam in Zoom meetings, the quality and color of my image are crucial. I set up the camera, downloaded their software's most recent version, and ensured the specs on my computer met the standard. I first tried it on my laptop, and the image was grainy and looked close to black and white. I played with the lighting, and it did not help. Then, I went to work to try this on a more powerful computer, and the results were the same. I did reach out to their customer support through their "chat" option. They were NOT helpful. Their comment was that their engineering team said it was fine. (I'll assume the brevity of the whole conversation was due to a language barrier). I really wanted to like this. Not worth the $110 I paid for it. Sending it back today.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars 15FPS (Frame Rate) Means Very Low Quality Video - Not For Pro Videographers
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to see if there is a way to make it work since the concept is good, but the video quality is atrocious.At 15 fps (the barest minimum acceptable for video) you'll need studio level lighting to even start to get a picture that is not pixelated or that the color isn't washed out on.I own a competitor product and in already interested in new developments but this falls short...a lot.There's a QR code on the box as shown in the pictures but you do not get any instructions on how to use that at all.So, if you open the software you download via the QR code and you open Zoom you're on your own to figure out what to do.It is indeed plug and play as described, but all that means is you plug it in and you see a very grainy video of yourself.I toyed around with camera settings in MS Teams and was able to make some adjustments but still not to the professional level it needed to be, plus, I want to use this with Zoom.For now we'll be sticking with our center competitor product because at this quality and high price it's not worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to setup and great to use!
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to setup. I just unplugged my old camera and plugged it in. Looks great and I'm able to keep my eyes on the screen while I participate in Zoom meetings. I only keep the camera on my monitor during meetings. Very good purchase!
